text: William Joseph Schallert (July 6, 1922 - May 8, 2016) was an American actor. He played the father on The Patty Duke Show. He is also known for his guest- star roles in The Smurfs, Jefferson Drum, Gunsmoke, Star Trek, Get Smart, Lawman, Matlock, The Waltons, Bonanza, The Andy Griffith Show and in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. Schallert was born on July 6, 1922 in Los Angeles, California.William Schallert (biography) - Turner Classic Movies. He married Rosemarie D. Waggner in 1949. Schallert was the president of the Screen Actors Guild from 1979 through 1981.
